EmailTemplate.description: Used to notify Sales, Marketing, MA when 10 or more CH1 Samples are sent by physician.
EmailTemplate.name: CH1 Notification 10+
EmailTemplate.subject: Guardant360 Challenge Sample Limit Exceeded
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello This is to inform you that Dr. {!Contact.Full_Name__c} from {!Account.Name} has submitted {!Contact.Total_Promo_Code__c} Guardant Challenge Samples. The limit for each provider is 10 tests.
Thanks Ruben Smith
